section.name: Mobile Services SMTP-Gateway-Direct-Test
section.p: This component is a test component tests the SMTP-Gateway component by sending a email message by calling directly the service method sendMailMessage.
The application can be started using the start.sh script in the smtpgw/test-direct/bin directory.
Note that since Knopflerfish does not allow paths cantaining ~ (UNIX home directory) the relative path /home/muellerr specified int init.xargs has to modified appropriately.
